page.title: 04SHOPPING IN FELTWELL
page.content: Feltwell village has many small shops but no large ones. We have one very small supermarket and six other shops which sell food, mostly general stores. There is a newsagent, bank (Three mornings a week) Post office, cycle shop, building society, estate agent and two sewing shops. Several other services (e.g. veterinary surgeon) come into the village on a part time basis. For a place this size there are few shops. People said that the shops they would most like to see in the village were a chemist and a furniture store. We found that not many people shopped for all their needs in the village, most preferring to shop in: {King's Lynn }(23%) {Bury St. Edmunds } (16%) {Thetford, Brandon, Downham {Market }(13% each) Some also liked to shop in {Ely, Cambridge or Norwich.
